channel.title: Stiles

item.title: Stiles
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Well…
I’m trying to make this stile move you onto the other side.
but only one side works! D:

case 7527: if (c.absX == 3045 && c.absY == 3305) { c.getPA().walkTo(-3,0); if(c.absX == 3042 && c.absY == 3305) { c.getPA().walkTo(3,0); } break;
The side that works is c.absx 3042 abs y 3305
I checked to see if it was a different object id, i triple checked to see if the coords were right, am I blankly looking past a typo?

Read full topic
